tool.name: SAGA.statistics_regression.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPREDICTOR False isArrayPOINTS False isArrayATTRIBUTE False output_data_REGRESSION $output_data_REGRESSION output_data_RESIDUAL $output_data_RESIDUAL name SAGA.statistics_regression.0 PREDICTOR $PREDICTOR POINTS $POINTS ATTRIBUTE $ATTRIBUTE RESAMPLING $RESAMPLING METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_REGRESSION $OutputSection_REGRESSION.outputType_REGRESSION transmissionMode_REGRESSION $OutputSection_REGRESSION.transmissionMode_REGRESSION outputType_RESIDUAL $OutputSection_RESIDUAL.outputType_RESIDUAL transmissionMode_RESIDUAL $OutputSection_RESIDUAL.transmissionMode_RESIDUAL

param.name: PREDICTOR
param.label: Predictor
param.help: Predictor The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml, json

param.name: ATTRIBUTE
param.label: Dependent Variable
param.help: Dependent Variable The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_REGRESSION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_RESIDUAL
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Regression analysis of point attributes with a grid as predictor. The regression function is used to create a new grid with regression based values. <br/><br/>Reference:<br/>- Bahrenberg, G., Giese, E., Nipper, J. (1990): 'Statistische Methoden in der Geographie 1 - Univariate und bivariate Statistik', Stuttgart, 233p.<br/>
